original_text: Thou art become guilty in thy blood that thou hast shed; and hast defiled thyself in thine idols which thou hast made; and thou hast caused thy days to draw near, and art come even unto thy years: therefore have I made thee a reproach unto the heathen, and a mocking to all countries.
korean_text: 네가 흘린 피로 말미암아 죄가 있고 네가 만든 우상으로 말미암아 스스로 더럽혔으니 네 날이 가까웠고 네 연한이 찼도다 그러므로 내가 너로 이방의 능욕을 받으며 만국의 조롱 거리가 되게 하였노라

sentences.original_text: Thou art become guilty in thy blood
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 흘린 피로 인하여 죄책감을 느끼게 되었으며

sentences.original_text: and hast defiled thyself in thine idols
and thou hast caused thy days to draw near
and art come even unto thy years
therefore have I made thee a reproach unto heathen
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 너를 이방인에게 비난거리가 되게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: and a mocking to all countries
